title: Aashayein
description: When he learns he has terminal cancer, a cynical gambler and chronic smoker ditches his fiancée, snubs doctors and checks into a nursing home to die.

title: Aata Pita
description: A municipal clerk with literary ambitions stalks a loan recovery officer on whom he has decided to base his story's central character.

title: Anchor Baby
description: A Nigerian couple living in the U.S. face agonizing fallout when they defy deportation orders with the hopes of giving their unborn child citizenship.

title: Aurora
description: 42-year-old Viorel, a distraught engineer, takes drastic measures to end his emotional suffering after enduring a devastating divorce.

title: Bittersweet
description: After 20 years abroad, a photographer returns to his birth country of Egypt and gets stranded without identification in a now unfamiliar culture.

title: Blue Valentine
description: As Cindy and Dean muddle through their languishing marriage, they hearken back to the golden days when life was filled with possibility and romance.

title: Burlesque
description: After leaving Iowa with stars in her eyes, Ali arrives at a Los Angeles burlesque lounge with dreams of taking the stage with her soaring voice.

title: Chal Dhar Pakad
description: After her fat-shaming husband brings home a new lover, a wife in Maharashtra recruits a group of women to challenge him in a kabaddi match.

title: Chance Pe Dance
description: Having risen from humble beginnings, an ambitious young man sets his sights on winning a major dance competition that could catapult him to fame.

title: Dhobi Ghat (Mumbai Diaries)
description: In this intimate drama, circumstances draw together four people from different castes – which would normally preclude them from forming friendships.

title: Eat Pray Love
description: After deciding to reshape her life after divorce, Liz travels around the world in search of good food, spirituality and true love.

title: Even the Rain
description: While making a film about the incursion of Christopher Columbus in the New World, a director finds the Bolivian locals protesting modern exploitation.

title: For Colored Girls
description: This adaptation of Ntozake Shange's play consists of a series of poetic vignettes that explore the lives of modern African American women.

title: Guzaarish
description: After an onstage disaster leaves an illusionist paralyzed, he channels his magic into a hit radio show. Years later, he fights for the right to die.

title: Haapus
description: The son of an astrologer faces opposition from his superstitious father regarding his scheme of launching a mango business.

title: Harud
description: A young Kashmiri man sets out to escape to Pakistan and make sense of his brother's death, but he drifts aimlessly until finding his brother's camera.

title: I Am
description: Four individuals in modern India grapple with their identities amid social taboos, trauma and brutal sexual discrimination in this quartet of stories.

title: I Am Kalam
description: An intelligent boy born into poverty befriends the son of a once noble family and is inspired by the life of India's president to pursue an education.

title: I Will Follow
description: Devastated after her aunt dies, Maye moves out of the home they shared and copes with her grief, yet finds comfort in the kindness of other mourners.

title: Irada Pakka
description: Bored in their happy marriage, a couple decides to spice things up by fighting more, but their game takes the relationship on an unexpected path.

title: Kajraare
description: A popular singer on the run poses as a bartender and falls in love with a prostitute, but their love is threatened by a violent incident in his past.

title: Karthik Calling Karthik
description: Unlucky in love and bullied at work, an office drone is resigned to his dead-end life until it’s transformed by mysterious calls from … himself.

title: Lalbaug Parel: Zali Mumbai Sonyachi
description: Industrial workers struggle against the greed of their employers and the apathy of the government toward the conditions in which they live and work.

title: Last Night
description: During an evening apart, married couple Joanna and Michael encounter tempting opportunities to cheat on each other with sexy acquaintances.

title: Love In A Puff
description: When the Hong Kong government enacts a ban on smoking cigarettes indoors, the new law drives hard-core smokers outside, facilitating a meeting between Cherie, a makeup saleswoman, and Jimmy, an advertising exec.

title: LSD: Love, Sex Aur Dhokha"
description: This provocative drama examines how the voyeuristic nature of modern society affects three unusual couples in Northern India.

title: Maharaja: The Story of Ranjit Singh
description: The tale of legendary warrior king Ranjit Singh, and his rise to establishing Punjab’s Sikh empire, comes to life in this animated feature.

title: Once Upon a Time in Mumbaai
description: Mumbai's top mob boss rules the underworld with honor and compassion, but his power-hungry protégé will shake up the world of organized crime.

title: Paan Singh Tomar
description: Paan Singh Tomar goes from celebrated runner to star brigand and rebel when life after sports fails to unfold as planned.

title: Peepli Live
description: Two indigent farmers consider suicide so that their families can collect a government subsidy that's paid to the relatives of deceased farmers.

title: Raajneeti
description: When the American-educated scion of a powerful Indian family returns to the subcontinent, his first taste of power starts him down a corrupt path.

title: Remember Me
description: Tyler's still feeling lost following the tragedy that's strained his relationship with his father when he meets Ally, a girl who understands his pain.

title: Road to Sangam
description: As communal violence erupts in his neighborhood, a Muslim mechanic presses forward to repair a historic truck that will transport Gandhi’s last remains.

title: Sarah's Key
description: Paris, 1942: To protect her brother from the police arresting Jewish families, a young girl hides him away, promising to come back for him.

title: Sex and the City 2
description: Best friends Carrie, Miranda, Samantha and Charlotte take a break from their busy New York lives for an all-expenses-paid luxury vacation to Abu Dhabi.

title: Sthaniya Sambaad
description: In post-Partition Kolkata, a young Bengali poet from an urban colony wanders the city in search of the woman he loves and a channel for his sorrows.

title: Stray Bullet
description: In 1976 Beirut, after a rendezvous with her old flame, soon-to-wed Noha witnesses a violent incident and changes course on a path to self-realization.

title: Teen Patti
description: Luck brings together math expert Perci Trachtenberg and obscure genius Venkat Subramaniam in a casino, but the foundations of probability may be utterly altered when their chat leads Subramaniam to try a new theory in the gambling dens of Mumbai.

title: The Ant's Scream
description: Released after being wrongly imprisoned in Iraq, an Egyptian contractor returns home to a country on the brink of revolution.

title: The Chord
description: A detective investigates the murder of a young musician, whose philandering lifestyle leaves a long list of suspects and a lot of questions.

title: The Company Men
description: A successful businessman comes face-to-face with America's downsizing epidemic when he loses his job and is forced to take a construction gig.

title: The Fighter
description: After a string of defeats, a boxer rediscovers his fighting will with help from his trainer and half-brother, a once-talented pugilist.

title: The Karate Kid
description: After moving to Beijing with his mother, Dre falls prey to a bully, so he takes lessons from a martial arts master in this remake of the 1984 classic.

title: The King's Speech
description: In this biographical drama, Britain's King George VI struggles with an embarrassing stutter until he seeks help from speech therapist Lionel Logue.

title: The Light of My Eyes
description: A composer hides his love for his formerly blind ex when she returns to Egypt engaged to his childhood friend — the doctor who restored her sight.

title: The Runaways
description: This biopic charts the rise of the rebellious California girls who formed the 1970s rock group the Runaways, paving the way for future girl musicians.

title: The Social Network
description: Director David Fincher's biographical drama chronicles the meteoric rise of Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg from Harvard sophomore to Internet superstar.

title: Thorne: Scaredy Cat
description: Heading a new team whose aim is to crack the cases that leave others stumped, detective Tom Thorne finds himself on the hunt for two serial killers.

title: Thorne: Sleepyhead
description: Investigating a series of attacks on young women, detective Tom Thorne is dragged back into the nightmares of his past as he races to find a killer.

title: Three-Quarters Decent
description: Determined to fight corruption in his country, a newspaper cartoonist debuts a new take-no-prisoners attitude.

title: Toll Booth
description: A toll booth operator's mundane life is upended when he's reassigned to a remote spot, where he finds intriguing strangers — and a new side to himself.

title: Tum Milo Toh Sahi
description: An astute but old-fashioned law clerk steps up to help the owner of a cafe in a legal battle that has both business and personal ramifications.

title: Udaan
description: Upon returning to his industrial hometown, a young man must decide whether to follow his own dreams or acquiesce to his father's plans for his future.

title: Virsa
description: A man is disheartened when he visits his well-to-do son and grandkids in Australia and sees they have detached from their traditional Indian morals.

title: We Are Family
description: A divorced mother of three children runs a happy household – until her former husband brings his new career-oriented girlfriend into the picture.

title: Winter's Bone
description: In this unflinching noir drama, a resilient teen goes on the trail of her missing, drug-dealing father when his absence threatens the family's safety.
